repo.name: python-deequ
repo.description: Python API for Deequ

readme.summary: Comprehensive documentation with excellent examples and quick start code, but lacks troubleshooting guidance and has incomplete configuration details.
readme.top_issue: No troubleshooting section for common issues like Spark/Java version conflicts, missing dependencies, or environment setup problems

common_complaints: Process/job hanging issues - spark-submit jobs don't exit cleanly when using Check class
Feature gaps vs Scala deequ - missing isPrimaryKey check, StringColumnProfile, numRecords, CustomSql analyzer
Version metadata not updated - __version__ attribute shows stale version numbers
Incomplete implementation - features available in Scala library not ported to Python
praise_themes: Library utility appreciated - user thanks maintainers for maintaining the project
Helpful for data quality projects - library is actively used in production
sentiment.summary: PyDeequ shows signs of maintenance neglect with slow issue resolution, multiple unaddressed feature requests from 2025, and critical bugs (process hanging) remaining unfixed since 2020 despite user workarounds being proposed.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being in April 2025
121 open issues with no closed issues in past 6 months indicates unaddressed backlog
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
No merged PRs in past 6 months shows no development activity
No releases recorded, suggesting version stagnation
maintenance.summary: pydeequ appears to be abandoned with no development activity, unresolved issues, and no contributor engagement in the past 6 months.

project_metrics.description: Python API for Deequ

readme.summary: Excellent documentation with clear explanations, comprehensive setup instructions, and strong troubleshooting guidance for both basic and advanced use cases.
readme.top_issue: README appears truncated at 'SERVICE API: Under' - incomplete setup wizard instructions may confuse users completing Tuya IoT account configuration

common_complaints: Device version detection and protocol compatibility issues (v3.4/v3.5)
Error 914 - 'Check device key or version' after extended polling
Scanner unable to detect certain devices despite successful manual connection
Invalid JSON responses and payload errors from devices
Connection failures and timeouts during local control
praise_themes: Library is reliable once properly configured
Useful scanning utility for device discovery
Promises to be 'very promising' when working
sentiment.summary: Community shows moderate health with active issues around device compatibility and protocol versions, but maintainers appear engaged with recent fixes and open issue discussion.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being recent (2026-01-11)
146 open issues with zero closed in past 6 months indicates no issue triage
No merged pull requests in past 6 months shows no active development
Zero active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process has stalled
maintenance.summary: The package appears abandoned with no maintenance activity (commits, merges, issue resolution) in the past 6 months despite a recent commit timestamp, indicating the project is not actively maintained.

repo.description: Bleach is an allowed-list-based HTML sanitizing library that escapes or strips markup and attributes

cves.summary: Bleach URI Scheme Restriction Bypass
regular expression denial-of-service (ReDoS) in Bleach
Cross-site scripting in Bleach

In Mozilla Bleach before 3.3.0, a mutation XSS affects users calling bleach.clean with math or svg; p or br; and style, title, noscript, script, textarea, noframes, iframe, or xmp tags with strip_comm
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.1.4, `bleach.clean` behavior parsing style attributes could result in a regular expression denial of service (ReDoS).
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.11, a mutation XSS affects users calling bleach.clean with noscript and a raw tag in the allowed/whitelisted tags option.
In Mozilla Bleach before 3.12, a mutation XSS in bleach.clean when RCDATA and either svg or math tags are whitelisted and the keyword argument strip=False.
Bleach vulnerable to mutation XSS via whitelisted math or svg and raw tag
XSS in Bleach when noscript and raw tag whitelisted

An issue was discovered in Bleach 2.1.x before 2.1.3. Attributes that have URI values weren't properly sanitized if the values contained character entities. Using character entities, it was possible t
